articles.description: Théo Pourchaire leads the way on Day 1 of pre-season testing in Sakhir
articles.content: Théo Pourchaire started his 2023 FIA Formula 2 season in style. Getting right back into the swing of things, the ART Grand Prix driver clocked in the fastest times of both the morning and afternoon r… [+6822 chars]
